Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
cms.stephenwongc195.controller.HomeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class HomeController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
HomeController class is used to handle the home screen.

    • handleUpdateCustomerBtn

      private void handleUpdateCustomerBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the update customer button click event and updates the selected customer in the DB. If no customer is selected, an error is thrown.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • handleDeleteCustomerBtn

      private void handleDeleteCustomerBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the delete customer button click event and deletes the selected customer from the DB. If customer has associated appointments, an error is thrown.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • handleDeleteAppointment

      private void handleDeleteAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles delete appointment click event. When clicked, the selected appointment is deleted from the DB.
